mapper.select: SELECT DIDX , DCREATEDTM , DAUDITDTM , DAUDITID , COLUMNA1 , COLUMNA2 , COLUMNA3 , COLUMNA4 , COLUMNA5 , COLUMNA6 , COLUMNA7 , COLUMNA8 , COLUMNA9 , COLUMNB1 , COLUMNB2 , COLUMNB3 , COLUMNB4 , COLUMNB5 , COLUMNB6 , COLUMNB7 , COLUMNB8 , COLUMNB9 , COLUMNC1 , COLUMNC2 , COLUMNC3 , COLUMNC4 , COLUMNC5 , COLUMNC6 , COLUMNC7 , COLUMNC8 , COLUMNC9 , COLUMND1 , COLUMND2 , COLUMND3 , COLUMND4 , COLUMND5 , COLUMND6 , COLUMND7 , COLUMND8 , COLUMND9 , COLUMNE1 , COLUMNE2 , COLUMNE3 , COLUMNE4 , COLUMNE5 , COLUMNE6 , COLUMNE7 , COLUMNE8 , COLUMNE9 , COLUMNF1 , COLUMNF2 , COLUMNF3 , COLUMNF4 , COLUMNF5 FROM mng_shop_product_tmp_tbl WHERE 1 = 1 AND DUSEYN = 'Y' AND DIDX = #{DIDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE mng_shop_product_tmp_tbl SET DUSEYN = 'N' WHERE DIDX = #{DIDX}
